SELECT ttt1.r_num, ttt1.r_content, ttt1.rd_con, ttt1.rd_name, ttt1.p_num, ttt1.o_name, ttt1.m_num, ttt1.o_num, ttt1.d_num FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rown, tt1.* FROM ( SELECT t2.r_num, t2.r_content, t1.rd_con, t1.rd_name, t3.p_num, t4.o_name, t4.m_num, t3.o_num, t3.d_num FROM rd t1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN review t2 ON t1.r_num = t2.r_num JOIN detail t3 ON t2.o_num=t3.o_num AND t2.d_num = t3.d_num JOIN order_t t4 ON t3.o_num = t4.o_num JOIN product t5 ON t3.p_num = t5.p_num WHERE t5.p_num = #{pNum} ORDER BY t2.r_dt ) tt1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNum} - 1) + #{pageSize} ) ttt1 WHERE rown >=( #{pageSize} * ( #{pageNum} - 1) +1)
